filing_deadlines.complaint: 3 years from discovery of injury or 1 year from discovery of wrongdoing
filing_deadlines.motion_to_dismiss: 60 days from service of summons or 30 days after answer is served

discovery_deadlines.depositions: Must be noticed at least 15 days before the deposition date
discovery_deadlines.disclosures: Automatic disclosures required within 30 days of appearance

filing_deadlines.trial_deadlines: Generally within 12 months of filing complaint
filing_deadlines.appeal_deadlines: 60 days from notice of entry of judgment

court_procedures.mandatory_arbitration: Cases valued under $50,000 may be subject to mandatory arbitration
court_procedures.case_management_conferences: Typically scheduled within 60 days of answer

fee_schedule.miscellaneous_fees: Varies by county and specific requirements

filing_requirements.page_limits: Points and authorities limited to 10 pages unless leave granted
